data.title: Evangelyne and Gobball
data.solution:
let [GX, GY, EX, EY, PO, PM] = [...readline().split(' ')]

let totalDist = Math.abs(GX - EX) + Math.abs(GY - EY) - PO

let turns = Math.ceil(totalDist / PM)

console.log(turns < 2 ? "FIGHT NOW" : turns)
data.statement:
Evangelyne needs your help to know how many turns it will take her to kill Gobball. 

Evangelyne can shoot an arrow at Gobball as long as she is within its <<range>>. (Manhattan distance)

She will move <<speed>> per turn and no less, and she can only move vertically and horizontally. 

One arrow is enough to kill Gobball.

For the sake of simplicity we always <<round up>> the number of turns before output. However, if the number of turns needed is {{1}} or fewer then output {{FIGHT NOW}}.
data.stubGenerator:
read x1:int y1:int x2:int y2:int rng:int mp:int

write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> One string separate by space with [[x1]] and [[y1]] for the coordinates of Gobball, [[x2]] and [[y2]] for the coordinates of Evangelyne, [[rng]] and [[mp]] for the characteristics of Evangelyne.

[[rng]] (range) is the distance of Evangelyne can shoot an arrow.
[[mp]] (speed) is the distance of Evangelyne can move in one turn.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> The number of turns it takes Evangelyne to kill Gobball, or {{FIGHT NOW}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Evangelyne needs your help to know how many turns it will take her to kill Gobball.

Evangelyne can shoot an arrow at Gobball as long as she is within its range. (Manhattan distance)

She will move speed per turn and no less, and she can only move vertically and horizontally.

One arrow is enough to kill Gobball.

For the sake of simplicity we always round up the number of turns before output. However, if the number of turns needed is 1 or fewer then output FIGHT NOW.
Input
Line 1 : One string separate by space with x1 and y1 for the coordinates of Gobball, x2 and y2 for the coordinates of Evangelyne, rng and mp for the characteristics of Evangelyne.

rng (range) is the distance of Evangelyne can shoot an arrow.
mp (speed) is the distance of Evangelyne can move in one turn.
Output
Line 1: The number of turns it takes Evangelyne to kill Gobball, or FIGHT NOW.
Constraints
x1,x2,y1,y2,rng,mp are all integers
0 <= x1,x2,y1,y2 <=100
0 < rng <= 10
0 < mp <= 6
Example
Input
12 87 0 10 4 5
Output
17
